website_summaries.verdict: A large-capacity 10-cup pitcher that delivers pure, refreshing tasting water.
pros: Turns bad-tasting tap water into smooth "no" taste alkaline water
Adds 20 trace minerals (electrolytes) back into the water
BPA-free pitcher with an LED memory lid to remind you when it's time to change the filter
cons: Minor problems with lid not staying secure while pouring

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 alkaline water. Awesome! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This alkaline picture is awesome, I love it arrived with no problems no cracks it doesn’t leak, as you can see from the photo I tested the water with a pH/ Orp meter in the pH is clearly 9.5 which is great!.. I followed the directions and ran three container full of water out of the unit and by that time the fogginess was gone and good to drink, it does take a little time for the water to drain into the bottom basin so just be prepared. The water taste great no and no more drinking straight tapwater, yuck! I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Trisonic

customer_reviews.title: For clean crisp water this is the pitcher to purchase
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is the best thing I ever bought for my wife. If you have ulcer's or stomach issues this is the best. It's not the $5000.00 machine but to give you a somewhat taste in how clean water can taste like, this is the pitcher you need to buy. When you drink out of this you can tell the difference from bottle water and drinking from filtered water. I would definitely recommend this pitcher to other people.
customer_reviews.author: omayra

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It works great. I purchased one from a different company that I had to return because the filter became clogged after just a few days. This one has worked very efficiently and I have been using it for about six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Helps so Very Much !!
customer_reviews.text: For my health I had to cut out acid in my diet.. and this Pitcher has made things a LOT BETTER.. I'm very happy with my alkaline Pitcher.. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ava D

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Excellent filter.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this filter. This is the best filter I have ever used. In fact, I was unable to use Brita filters or any brand due to my allergies. More than that, tap water, even filtered, make me ill. I took a chance on this because I have been going broke for years buying bottled water. Guess what? THIS WORKS FOR ME. I can drink the water after its been filtered through Naples Naturals filters. I will always use this product and never go back to buying bottled water. Thank you Naples.
customer_reviews.author: roze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water and simple to use! After some use will have to add something. The first filter worked perfectly. The second filter did not. I've had to take the pitcher apart now, constantly, shake the filter, and reassemble. This is time-consuming and irritating. Evidently, the filters might be prone to clogging or not allowing water to flow when the particles inside the filters are wet. However, I want to note that the water in my area is hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Lorenzen

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you like to shake things up.
customer_reviews.text: Every time I added water, I had to first take out the filter and shake it vigorously. Only then did it actually deliver anything that tastes better than my funky tap water. Big hassle and time waster. Would have returned but I'd already destroyed the box, thinking it would only be a problem for the first few fill-ups. My mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed several alkaline water filter/pitchers and decided that the Naples Naturals was the "best fit!" WELL, after only 19 days and indicator showing 46% filter #1 is just about kaput! (finished) Done! Our water is hard, we have H2O softener and I filter water through a Brita BEFORE asking the Naples Naturals to do anything. At this point in time, I am very disappointed. That is All.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J. Nover

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good water filter. I filter the water and then pour it into another container. This helps in keeping cold water for cooking or drinking. You must run water through filter at least one time before drinking. The first time it comes out slight black in color. My filter did not work one time when I first got it. I reinserted the filter and haven't had any problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems like lots of people are complaining about the filters clogging, but doesn’t that just mean it’s catching a lot of junk that would otherwise be in your water? Mine works great, no issues, no slowdowns, and the water tastes very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Magmonkey34

customer_reviews.title: Save money, make your own bottled water at home.
customer_reviews.text: What I like about the Naples Natural Water picture/filter is the ability to reduce chemicals in the water. I am thrilled to have found a filter good enough to stop buying five gallon jugs of spring water. I bought some water test strips, and found the water to be equal in purity.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Kleypas

customer_reviews.title: ... this pitcher now for a few months and I like it a lot for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this pitcher now for a few months and I like it a lot for the most part. It's easy to use and the water tastes nice. Im currently on my fifth filter since we use 2 or 3 gallons of water a day and our filters stop working before the counter indicates. The filters seem pretty hit and miss. Im not sure if Im doing something wrong or what, but every other filter seems to work perfectly with nice flow to the bottom while the others seem to experience some issue where the water gets stuck in the top or just barely drips into the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Awful tasting water and poor filter design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The filter became clogged after only four refills (and that was using pre-filtered water from the Brita pitcher) and the water tasted horrible after going into this pitcher--like a combination of plastic and rubber. Don't buy this. There are many other water filtering options that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: MLA-G

customer_reviews.title: Love this Water filter...
customer_reviews.text: I never thought water could taste so much different between the variations of filtration or lack there of, the packaging it’s in, and other variables. I am very picky with water, I never used to drink it very often at all actually, but when I found out I was in kidney failure I needed to make some drastic changes. This filter has been one of them and it has me now drinking water all day long and looking forward to it, it tastes amazing and so far it’s been durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nonameneeded

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing. Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Poor manufacturing. The water leaked from the glued area on the filter. So the water was being unfiltered and tainted with glue each time I filled it. Amazon sent me a replacement and it worked better but the lid fell off on my toddlers head with water. Not long after the top small water fill door broke off leaving it ready for the next accident to occur. Water tastes good but with all these things that were done cheaply and not properly tested this makes me wonder if the filter itself is of cheap or low quality. Look elsewhere. This is cheap stuff that looks good, marketed well, but dangerous and possibly unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Chitownvet

customer_reviews.title: An excellent pitcher -- a super company!
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful new pitcher arrived, and when I filled the water reservoir, I noticed that the water wan't coming out from the bottom and/or sides of the filter, it was spraying out where the filter was screwed in. I called the company, and got a wonderful Customer Support representative. He explained what was causing the problem (the filter), gave me a couple of suggestions on how it might be corrected, and sent me two new filters (in case the filter still didn't work right). It doesn't get any better than this!
customer_reviews.author: marshamarshamarsha

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Just as described & can’t wait to taste the water!!!
customer_reviews.author: Codie Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design- you can’t clean it!
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to get inside and actually clean it. Plus the handle has broken, the lid snapped and he bit that lifts for the water to come out snappeed off long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mummy the girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Alkaline water trying to counteract the amount of coffee and other acidic foods I consume. I find it is significantly cheaper than buying bottled water and better for the environment. Annoying to keep refilling, but not the end of the world. I like using to brew coffee and boiling for tea, as well as regular drinking water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The bet thing I could of ever brought...
customer_reviews.text: I love the pitcher, you have to make sure you allow the water to run through the pitcher until the water is clear then your set............I've told my whole family about the Naples Naturals Alkaline Water Filer Pitcher, they all have placed an order....
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I actually checked the Ph and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I actually checked the Ph and it was about 8.8 which is good. Our tap water is gross and this makes it taste amazing.
customer_reviews.author: kadedra

customer_reviews.title: 5 star vendor
customer_reviews.text: This vendor is very good. I give them 5stars. The water is very good also. Much better than the 2 stage one I have now. I will buy my filters from them because they treated me very well.
customer_reviews.author: Esstk

customer_reviews.title: Good 8.4 pH Water
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this the past month and it works great. When I test the water each week our tap water is around 6.8 pH, the Naples Alkaline water pitcher is a consistent 8.4 pH and it tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Water- Sturdy - lL
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best pitcher i’ve ever purchased! The water tastes delicious and the reservoir has a very large capacity, so makes sufficient water for at least a full day. I did not do research on the benefits of alkaline water, so can’t comment on that. The only problem I’ve encountered is that I havent figured out how to be certain the lid is tightly sealed, so I've flooded my countertop a couple of times (probably my fault)....so I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: M. R. McDougal

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Filters are now unavailable?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this filter pitcher in April 2020 and now find that you no longer offer the replacement filters and indicate on your website that you do not know WHEN they will be available. That is so disappointing and unfair. Why offer products that require replacement filters that you no longer carry and may not carry again?
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Even if it isn’t alkaline, I know it’s filtered.  Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how this can make the water alkaline but it does taste fresh and I do know it is filtering so that is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jglhendricks

customer_reviews.title: Order extra filters  with initial purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little awkward.the digital calendar broke right away. Now, I can’t tell how many days the filter has been in... I did not break it , it just stopped. Also, replacement filters took forever to order, I had to go to the company... Amazon said backordered for months . As far as how it works... pretty good and it has a decent flavor. I would probably buy a Britta next time... easier to replace filters. But, I wanted an alkaline filter.
customer_reviews.author: Ammas Ameya

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It does what the description said it would do, alkalines water, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Akaline Water Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I chose the black pitcher and am using it with well water. After almost a month of use it's still not disappointing. The countdown mechanism on the top is very helpful and I love knowing that I am drinking less acidic water. I wish the pitcher and filters were a little cheaper but you get what you pay for and the price really is not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Frugaliciously Fab

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have an RO system but wanted to make the water alkaline. This works great! Everything functions perfectly. Read some negative reviews prior to purchase about the lid etc. but I have not experienced anything remotely negative. Everything works and functions perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Where is the replacement filter?
customer_reviews.text: It said it came with a replacement filter it did not just one filter was included. I still have to test the water to see if it has the levels I need. I wish the pitcher was bigger as I try to drink a gallon a day and it takes two/three fills for me to fill my jug.
customer_reviews.author: 1804Empress

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I am affecting my health in a positive way. I am so impressed with the customer service. Zen was so patient and kind along with being open to suggestions. I found the filtered water had a slight taste that was so easy to become accustomed to.
customer_reviews.author: PeggyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Dripless
customer_reviews.text: As others have indicated I have needed to shake the filter after almost every use or the water just sits in the top reservoir. Would have returned but didn’t use at first and return window passed
customer_reviews.author: ralph p stahlberg

customer_reviews.title: great product, great company service
customer_reviews.text: Love the pitcher. A piece of the lid broke off after 2 weeks of constant use and the company is sending a replacement at no charge!
customer_reviews.author: pamd

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because my friend owns one and I tasted it and fell in love with it. Only thing is the top broke few days after and they had to send me a replacement. The filters are more expensive than Britta but they taste way better. I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: MARIAMLOSANGELES

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: After too many Britta water filters - wanted to try something new. This is just fine. The chlorine taste of the apartment water is gone. It looks nice on the counter; handle feels good in my hand. The filling chamber is large.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the pitcher for a month and love it. There is an issue with the lid if you have water in the top, but if you wait for it all to filter down there are no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Water purification
customer_reviews.text: Love the water “flavor” that we get with this pitcher. We don’t taste the chlorine or other stuff floating in our water. The only thing is the little cover over the spout cane broken & we just didn’t send it back because we needed it so badly. And if you pour too fast the larger lid falls off so pour slowly. But the quality of the water is great.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great during this crisis. We all know bottled water isn’t good for the environment. Now you can’t get bottled water. Our family loves this filtered pitcher and the taste is great! It takes 5 min. To filter and fill up. After the initial 15 min of soaking /rinsing the filter, and 2 runs of filling up pitcher you are ready! I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jmc

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The water tastes great and it doesn't take too long to filter.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda N

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I just got it today and instantly fell in love with the design but also the taste, definitely boosts up the taste of my daily morning water. Would get again if this one ages or for a gift but my room mates also love the new update. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ixchel

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the taste of the water this filter and pitcher produces. Maybe alkaline water is supposed to have an off flavor, in which case I'll stick with drinking traditional filtered water. Very disappointing results.
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: a Present
customer_reviews.text: looks like the perfect present as the filters where a plus at that price, I'm sure they will be happy. :-) thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery for day counter did not last long. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a better review except for the fact that the battery which powers the daily counter died abruptly. So now we have no easy way to keep count of when to replace the filter. Also, it’s important to note that the lid will fly off the top while poring if there is unfiltered water in the container. When this happens it’s a huge mess. So hold the lid on tight when pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert C.

customer_reviews.title: this is the second one i have bought
customer_reviews.text: great option if you want alkaline water. the taste reminded me of fiji water. it was a little confusing at first to get things working but just read the directions of look them up online and you will be fine. its definitley worth the money to drink healthy water!
customer_reviews.author: artoniquenelson@gmail .com

customer_reviews.title: Water is not alkaline as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tested water 3 times using Ph strips. the Ph was around 6.5 max. didn't return filters and pitcher as likely they will end up in a landfill. will use pitcher as a regular water filter till i exhaust the two filters than decide afterward. what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this water pitcher. Water tastes clean and it is simple to use. I got rid another name brand pitcher because if it was full and you poured water you may get spill over from the unfiltered portion. This works well for me and so far filters the water extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Mine keeps clogging up.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty bulky and mine stops working often. Then I have to take it all apart and soak the filter again. I'm not happy, but the water tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: PGMarianne

customer_reviews.title: Never need bottled water again!
customer_reviews.text: Using this to filter city water and wow what a difference! Tastes great, just make sure to keep it filled and not to let the filter dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Battleforutopia

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of filtering the crap out of the lousy tap water we have here in southern Cal but every time I fill the pitcher, I have to bang it on the counter to get it to go through!
customer_reviews.author: ExSvcMgr

customer_reviews.title: Alkaline  water well !!
customer_reviews.text: I tested the water with store bought alkaline water. Great reading. We have had this for several months. I think it makes you drink more water. We refill and sit on counter . The only con, the lid needs a better design for removing to refill and pouring into your glass. You must hold the lid while pouring.
customer_reviews.author: San Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great pitcher, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher, make sure to read setup brochure before using included in your box
customer_reviews.author: Elwood W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to pour. The lid doesn't stay so you need both hands. Wish I could still return but I passed the return date. Flavor is good but since I have a wrist problem and the lid doesn't stay is not good value for me. I might not understand the lid's computer because I set it and even without refilling the # goes down which makes it inaccurate to me.
customer_reviews.author: TL 235

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! (No longer liking it)
customer_reviews.text: Great style, easy to use and I really like it. Once you filter the water the 3 times before use it does leak out so be aware of that. So far so good, great taste! *Update filters are always out of stock and the handle has broken off and my kids have a hard time pouring it without the lid popping off.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: 3 months filter
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture. Narrow too put in refrigerator, filter can last for three months and I like how easy it is to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Agates

customer_reviews.title: Clogs.
customer_reviews.text: God, we could not wait to throw this thing away. Constantly spilled everywhere if you weren’t forcefully holding the lid down. Which, fine, you could tape it. Problem solved. But the filters...... the one it came with worked perfectly. The replacements clogged CONSTANTLY. Instructions were followed, yet we were daily working to get it to filter properly.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Kupau

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't filter often
customer_reviews.text: The filter works about 20% of the time. When it works, the water tastes great! But most of the time the water just sits up top. I could have gotten a bad one though. But every morning I need to dump the entire thing out to start again, you can't keep pouring in water to filter like a normal brita.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good To Go!
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes fantastic! We are very happy with this purchase. Quality container and does exactly what is says. Water does not have any weird taste, particles or anything that would cause concern. We are happy we switched-saving over $100 a month from bottled water purchases and a delivery service. Filter and drink!
customer_reviews.author: leya bonorris

customer_reviews.title: Filter doesn't drain
customer_reviews.text: Once the water drains from the top, it stops about 1/2 way down. If I pick the top bucket up, it starts to drain again. I tried to contact for a replacement filter and did not have a reply. I'm not going to invest in another filter (they are not inexpensive) if I don't know it will work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Best price for this purpose
customer_reviews.text: I needed something portable as I rent/not own so installing into plumbing would not be an option. There are other counter-top pitchers that cost much more. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the pour spout cover broke as soon as used first time and the top cover where water goes before filtration keeps coming off. Otherwise, I am happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: TLChief

customer_reviews.title: Only 3-4 weeks in the the lid keeps falling off into the water reservoir
customer_reviews.text: I can deal with the slow process of the water going through the filter, but for the cost of this unit to have the lid to the water reservoir continually fall off or usually back into the reservoir is annoying!! Can that be fixed? very frustrating!! I would not recommend the current model at this price with this annoying, constant issue. Naples needs to fixt it
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product
customer_reviews.text: I like what this water pitcher SHOULD do however it is not the best. This pitcher holds water in the top portion. I contacted the company and the solution is to take out the filter, shake it and replace it. I am a busy person and don’t have for this. Not the best product; needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and water tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: We love the taste of filtered water. Not going back to tap. The only change we have made is to also filter out the flouride in our tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Lanning

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good size, works great! Last one I had the filters clogged, so far so good with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Manx Man

customer_reviews.title: Great for 60 days but not after that
customer_reviews.text: At first the filter worked great, easy to use, water tastes great. Now I had to change the filter for the first time....Not only do none of my replacement filters work properly, I also can’t even change the replacement indicator display. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: JBro

customer_reviews.title: I tested the water after it was filtered. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested the water after it was filtered. It came out as 9.5 ph so it is very alkaline. Just want I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara K. Weigeshoff

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use & makes your water velvety smooth... I love it! I have not had any problems with cartridge or with the top coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features!
customer_reviews.text: The digital read out on the top is peeling up but we love the pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Zeiner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work except you have to hold the lid down when you pour or the water gushes from around lid edges. When you spend this much on a water filter pitcher the lid should fit tighter. I will keep it, but I would never buy another one. Update...after 5 weeks the filter is no longer working, at $15 a pop it was supposed to last 2 months. What a waste of money this purchase was :(
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

customer_reviews.title: it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: There's one thing that makes this water filter a pain to use...you have to shake it each time you add water to it otherwise it gets stuck. But besides that hassle, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicco & Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best product of this type I have found for the price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Good Water Pitcher, but be careful with the cover hinge.
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit, but the top water cover hinge broke the next day after I received it.
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Bad pitcher design
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. Though it may filter the water, the construction of the pitcher itself iis very poor. The pour spout doesn’t pour smoothly and suddenly opens. The entire top lid does not snap into place tightly. After the lid fell off 3 times, spilling out the entire pitcher of water, I’m throwing it away. Just wish I could get my money back. This is a definite “no”.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this item. Our water tastes so gross to us before and the filter last about 2 months on the dot. We are about to purchase another 1 so we can have 2.
customer_reviews.author: Danisha Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: It’s refreshing in the evenings. In the mornings the water from this gizmo actually doesn’t feel very wet when I drink it!
customer_reviews.author: Baymuse

customer_reviews.title: Trusted product
customer_reviews.text: The filter is a bit time consuming to prepare before drinking, but at least it lets me know that the water I am drinking is thoroughly cleaned. Tasty water.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ly

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: The reader is falling off which I need to call about, but it definitely makes our water taste phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Alkaline Water Instantly
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my pitcher. I read that there were problems with the lid, but I have had no problems what so ever. Must have been addressed. This pitcher purifies the water fast and I love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Charion Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Holds small amount of water - can only fill half way or water wont filter and water in reservoir will spill everywhere when you go to pour. Also replacement filters are difficult to find in stock. Wish I would have bought a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: It works...  IF YOU CAN GET FILTERS!
customer_reviews.text: Update to my initial review... The pitcher works great once the filter is broken in. Now the problem is... NO FILTERS! WHAT GOOD IS IT WITHOUT THE FILTERS!
customer_reviews.author: HardcoreZen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped filtering?
customer_reviews.text: Came in a very damaged box but the pitcher wasn’t damaged. I put it all together easily and enjoyed it for 24hrs and now it doesn’t seem to be filtering well. It’s been several hours and the water is not passing through. Update: it’s doing better now. Now my order for a refill cartridge was cancelled and I’m not even sure where to find one that matches my model number of this thing. No Easy way to contact the sellers... don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I got tired of water bottles and running to the store for water. The water tastes better than store bought and is so convenient. Less stress on me and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: vonisha deane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The water when filled up has a good and the taste seems really clean. The only problem I have is when pouring water from it spills if you fill it up past the halfway point. Besides, that and the water seems only halfway, and the filters needing to be constantly changed its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Works and really does increase PH in the water
customer_reviews.text: I tested the alkaline in the water 1 month into the 2 months and it's still at 7. Which is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Filter
customer_reviews.text: The filter is more trouble than it is worth. It keeps clogging. You have to take it out, shake it, replace it, take it out, shake it, replace it. Beginning to wonder if it is even worth it and this is only day 3
customer_reviews.author: V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pitcher, can be heavy once full.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of the water from this pitcher. It does hold a lot of water. When it is full it can take 2 hands to take out of the fridge. I highly recommend this pitcher to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Thorntoncitykat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I hate our city water! Bought this pitcher and its like drinking bottled water! Highly recommended this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: The filters last longer than the mfg say they will ...
customer_reviews.text: The filters last longer than the mfg say they will. Does what it says it will do, I test every batch.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Do an extra pitcher of water when starting up or the water still tastes funny. Otherwise love it. Water tastes great, easy to use. Life meter also a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Slow to filter the water, filter gets clogged so I have to bang it on the counter to get it going again. Lid doesn’t stay on very well. I know it does change the pH of my tap water because I tested it with strips so that was good! Now it’s time to replace my filter and they are no longer available so what was the point of buying this pitcher?! Pretty annoyed with that...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - no replacement filters available
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these pitchers. The pitchers are great, until the filters needs to be replaced. They are (and have been) out of stock on replacement filters (yet they continue to sell new pitchers), and competitor filters state that they do not fit this brand. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L&JH

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: could definitely tell a difference in taste in the first few glasses. Not so much after a few days (I refill at least twice day).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The filters work for a long time. My dental hygienist is raving about the condition of my teeth and gums..never knew it would have an impact on that!
customer_reviews.author: doglady

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it because it is easy to use. I love the taste as well. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha W.

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste very clean just like spring water i ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste very clean just like spring water i would give it 10 stars if i could. Thank you Naples Rolfing inc for such a great product .
customer_reviews.author: Smart shopper 7

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: The front spout broke the second time I use it? I put tape on it now. Quickly goes through the filter Water tastes great cold. However when it sits in glass and get room temp it tastes like a chemical?
customer_reviews.author: Zaffy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but it doesn’t hold much
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice pitcher, water tastes better and it does what it’s supposed to do just wish it held more! Constantly refilling it
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: don’t waste your money! lid comes off while pouring water, same colored replacement filter not available, the counter for filter stops working after a month....
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Filter sucks
customer_reviews.text: The filters are terrible, they take forever to fill and usually I have to take the filter off, fool with it for awhile and then try it again. The water always has grey stuff at the bottom from the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Grace A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: When delivered, filter top was partially off. Would not screw into water basin correctly. Tried to get it out, it broke. Very poorly made. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr L. Hawaii

product_meta.title: Naples Naturals 109X2 Alkaline Water Filter Pitcher - Removes Chlorine and Contaminants Plus Increases pH (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:109 BLACK EXTRA FILTERNewly designed filter cartridge to minimize the chances of clogging. Drink fresh clean great tasting water with the BPA FREE Naples Naturals 10 cup water filter pitcher. Sits right on your counter or in your refrigerator and is the perfect way to provide great tasting water. Features digital electronic filter life readout lets you know when it's time to change your filter. Newly designed screw in filter protects water better than the old drop in filter designs BPA free plastic easy fill convenient 10 cup capacity filter life the filter should be changed every 70 gallons or roughly 45-60 days depending on water usage directions rinse the filter under cold water for about 30 seconds. Gently Tap the filter on the counter (both sides) to ensure the media is proportioned nicely. Remove the water reservoir and screw the filter into the bottom of the reservoir and replace the assembly back into the pitcher. Fill and discard 2-5 pitchers or until the water is clear and there are no more Charcoal particles in the pitcher water. Fill and enjoy! the filter should be replaced every 70 gallons or when the filter replacement indicator signals a changed is needed. Do not use with hot water.
feature_bullets: “Best of the Best” as rated by Best Reviews
Stay hydrated with this delicious water that will keep you coming back
Reduce waste by making clean water at home
Perfectly balances water mineral content for brewing coffee and tea
Looks great on the counter & fits easily in the fridge door
Crafted from high quality, food grade resins that are BPA free
